Name: Fractal: Make Blooms Not War
About the game: From the award-winning team that brought you Auditorium and Pulse: Volume One comes Fractal , an enthralling music puzzler experience. Push, Combo, and Chain your way through a pulsing technicolor dreamscape all the while expanding your consciousness at 130 BPM. With 3 unique and challenging game modes, amazing HD-Quality graphics, and an ever-evolving soundtrack, Fractal is sure to destroy what little productivity you have left. Key Features: 3 Distinct modes of play: Campaign, Puzzle, and Arcade All-new Musicbox Audio Engine composes music based on how you play Colors! Hexagons! Particle Effects! Ridiculous Callouts!
